newsitem.title: UK: Iberia looks to up ex-UK cargo rates 5pct.
newsitem.headline: Iberia looks to up ex-UK cargo rates 5pct.

text.p: Spanish state airline Iberia is likely to increase its ex-UK cargo rates by 5 pct from April 1, its UK cargo sales manager Enrique Sagra said.
Affiliate airline Aerolineas Argentina, is also likely to follow suit with an ex-UK five percent cargo rate rise from the same date, he added.
"Final decisions on these increases will be made over the next two weeks," Sagra told Reuters.
He said if any were implemented, they would not be related to fuel surcharges currently being implemented by Iberia and many other airlines.
"As far as the future of our fuel surcharges is concerned, we at Iberia are waiting to see what the big boys (airlines) in the industry are going to do before we make a decision," he said.
--Air Cargo Newsroom Tel +44 171 542 7706 fax +5017 (c) Reuters Limited 1997
